page.title: 19LITTLE CHATFIELDS,WARNINGLID
page.content: We are the{Smith family.}We first came to{Warninglid}in{1975.}There are {6 people}in the family; Mum,Dad,Sandra Sandra(13),(Richard 11),David(6) and Rebecca (5). We have a dog,a cow,3 cats and a chicken on our smallholding. The bungalow was built just before the Second World War. We have{4 acres}in all.{One acre}is used for{growing vegetables}and the other{three}are used for{grazing}for the cow.The vegetables we mainly grow are tomatoes,aubergines,celery & peppers in a plastic tunnel. We also grow potatoes,lettuce,runner beans & onions outside. We used to sell vegetables ,but we don't any more because we don't grow that much now. We eat some & freeze the rest.My mum bakes all our cakes & buys our Bread at the Bolney Bakery.
